\begin{table}[h]
   \centering
   \resizebox{0.49\textwidth}{!}{
   \begin{tabular}{c c c c}
   \toprule
   Merge Strategy   &   Prec. & Recall & F1\\
   \midrule
   Person   & 0.348 & 0.244 & 0.280\\
   Concept (\citeauthor{liu-etal-2015-toward-abstractive})*   & 0.363 & 0.277 & 0.293\\
   Unmerged*   & 0.327 & 0.359 & 0.332\\
   Combined*   & \textbf{0.412} & \textbf{0.400} & \textbf{0.398}\\
   Person+Unmerged & 0.289 & 0.469 & 0.350 \\
   \bottomrule
   \end{tabular}}
   \caption{Precision, recall, and F1 of document node selection under different merge strategies. A method is marked with (*) if the difference between it and the method one row above is statistically significant.}
   \label{tab:content_selection}
\end{table}

title: An analysis of document graph construction methods for AMR summarization
